Headline: Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier track switching problems at Ashland/Lake. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier track switching problems at Ashland/Lake. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Service Between 54th/Cermak and Polk, Only
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains operate from 54th to Polk only, due to track switching problems at Ashland/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains operate from 54th to Polk only, due to track switching problems at Ashland/Lake.

As a result, Pink Line trains are running as follows:

  • For service to downtown from Pink Line stations between 54th/Cermak and Polk and board a shuttle bus at Polk for connecting service. Shuttle buses are available from Polk to Clark/Lake in both directions

Other possible alternatives may include: 

  • #9 Ashland
  • #21 Cermak
  • #49 Western
  • #50 Damen
  • #52 Kedzie/California
  • #53 Pulaski
  • #54 Cicero
  • #60 Blue Island-26th
  • #82 Kimball-Homan
  • #94 South California
  • #157 Streeterville-Taylor buses

...including to/from and in combination with other 'L' services.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
